def_en: A pillar is a tall solid structure, which is usually used to support part of a building.

def_cn: （制度、协议等的）支柱，核心
def_en: If something is the pillar of a system or agreement, it is the most important part of it or what makes it strong and successful.
If you describe someone as a pillar of society or as a pillar of the community, you approve of them because they play an important and active part in society or in the community.
